[Male Kamael Warrior Class Transfer]:
A male Kamael Warrior who has reached level 20 may change his class to a Trooper. A character may undertake the class transfer quest at level 18; if successful, they will be able to use more specialized and powerful skills than before. In order to become a Trooper, you must first meet Master Gwain. Master Gwain can be found in the Town of Gludio. Go and seek him out.
Close Window.
